saying: A thing of beauty is a joy forever.
description: Pango is a peppy, anteater villager from the Animal Crossing series. She has appeared in every game so far. Her name is a shortening of pangolin, also known as the scaly anteater, a mammal that lives in tropical parts of Asia and Africa. However, pangolins are not actually anteaters, belonging instead to the group of animals known as pholidota.
